Package com.spoken.Utility

Class ServiceUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spoken.Utility.ServiceUtility
  • public class ServiceUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains various utility function like creating password using Encoding scheme, getting current time, Checking extension for various format Supported in application, Create various folder in application, Uploading file etc.
    Author:
    om prakash

      • createclassSubjectFolder

        public static boolean createclassSubjectFolder​(java.lang.String className,
                                               java.lang.String subject,
                                               java.lang.String topicName)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates folder related to topic created in application based on given input in string format of various classes like Classname, Subject and Topic.
        Parameters:
        className - String value containing ClassName
        subject - String value containing Subject ID
        topicName - String value containing TopicName ID
        Returns:
        boolean value denoting true for Successful and false for failure.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
